item.title: An Elixir Macro to Log Hyperlinks
item.author: patrick@rwx.io (Patrick Goddi)
item.description: When looking at Logger output in the terminal, many times it would be nice to simply click on a message and have it open Emacs to the correct location in the corresponding file. There are a variety of ways to accomplish this, I chose to use terminal hyperlinks along with adding an Emacs URI protocol to my system.
